actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

official_title: A bill to prohibit revenue recovery firms and certain auditors from receiving compensation on a percentage of findings basis, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Fair Auditing Act of 1990 - Directs the Secretary of Health and Human Services to promulgate regulations prohibiting hospitals, medical clinics, and insurance companies that receive Federal assistance from compensating a revenue recovery firm or third party auditor on the basis of a percentage of the revenue findings of an audit conducted by such firm or auditor.
